story:
Once upon a time, in a beautiful mountain village in Armenia, there lived a kind and curious little boy named Aram. Aram loved to explore the lush forests and rolling hills that surrounded his village, and he would often come home with pockets full of wildflowers, feathers, and fascinating rocks.

One day, as Aram was wandering through the woods, he stumbled upon a small, hidden cave. Curiosity getting the best of him, Aram stepped inside and found a majestic eagle perched on a rock ledge. The eagle, with its piercing yellow eyes and feathers as white as snow, was the most beautiful creature Aram had ever laid eyes on.

The eagle spoke, startling Aram. "I have been watching you, little one, and I can see that you have a kind heart and a loving spirit. I am the guardian of the magical Forest of Wishes, and I have been sent to guide you there. In this forest, your deepest desires can come true, but you must be careful and only make wishes for the greater good."

Aram's heart raced with excitement as the eagle led him through the forest. They passed trees that shimmered with gold and silver leaves, meadows filled with flowers that never wilted, and a crystal-clear river that flowed with enchanted water. When they finally reached the heart of the forest, Aram was awestruck by the sight of a vast, shimmering lake with shards of moonlight weaving through the surface.

The eagle explained that the water was infused with magic, allowing Aram to make three heartfelt wishes. Aram thought for a moment before making his first wish: that the forests and the animals in them would always be protected and cherished. A warm, golden light enveloped the lake, and Aram knew that his wish had been granted.

For his second wish, Aram wished for the wellbeing, happiness, and prosperity of his beloved village. A silver light spread across the water, and Aram could feel his wish being carried on the wind to the village.

Finally, Aram thought deeply about what he wanted for his last wish. He looked at the wise eagle and then around the enchanted forest. With a big smile on his face, he made his third and final wish - that he could return and share the magic of this forest with his family, friends, and fellow villagers.

The eagle nodded approvingly, and a brilliant rainbow of colors erupted from the lake, blending together to form a magnificent swirling vortex. Aram held onto the eagle's strong talons as they were carried through the vortex, returning to the entrance of the cave.

From that day on, Aram made sure that he cherished the beautiful nature around him and worked tirelessly to protect it, ensuring that his first wish would last for generations to come. The magic of the Forest of Wishes had left an indelible mark in Aram's life, fueling his love for the world around him and inspiring those in his village to do the same.

As Aram grew up to be a wise and loving man, he shared this incredible story of his adventure with his own children, and they would pass it on to theirs, always remembering the kindness and wisdom that Aram showed during his time in the enchanted Forest of Wishes.

And with that, my dear son, it is time for you to close your eyes and drift off into a peaceful slumber, where your dreams may take you to magical worlds like that of Aram and the enchanting Forest of Wishes. Goodnight.
